definition: Portugal/Portuguese/abbr. for 葡萄牙[Pu2 tao2 ya2]

sentences.english: The juice of the grapes is pressed out.
In modern period now, there are a number of people making verjuice.
sentences.chinese: 現在的社會還有很多製造酸葡萄汁的人。

sentences.english: The majority of all brandies are distilled from a fermented mash of grapes.
sentences.chinese: 大多數白蘭地都從葡萄汁中蒸餾獲得。

sentences.english: This is the time of the year when they press their grapes.
sentences.chinese: 這是他們榨葡萄汁的季節。

sentences.english: Ask Well: Health Benefits of Red Wine vs.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒與葡萄汁，孰的健康功效更勝一籌？

sentences.english: White wine is the product of the fermentation of pure grape juice obtained from grapes by extraction from grapes.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒是從葡萄中提取純葡萄汁發酵得到的產品。

sentences.english: The juice of the grapes was pressed out.
Help me to trample out the grapes for the wine.
This press is used to press the grapes to extract the juice, and colour from the skins.
sentences.chinese: 這種壓榨方法可以將葡萄汁及顏色從果皮內榨出來。

sentences.english: They crushed out the juice of grapes in a wine-press.
sentences.chinese: 他們用制酒壓榨機將葡萄汁榨出。

sentences.english: Ron Baccardi, Bols strawberry, Bols creme de menthe, Grape juice.
sentences.chinese: 百家得朗姆酒，波士草莓，白橙皮和葡萄汁。

definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
